arts.ttl: Solskjaer confirmed as new Besiktas boss
arts.sum: Former Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer signs an 18-month deal as head coach of Besiktas.

arts.ttl: Katic path clear, Dessers exit rules 'set' and £5m Besiktas plot goes beyond Lawrence – Rangers transfer bulletin
arts.sum: Rangers have started their January business and things look to be ramping up at Ibrox

arts.ttl: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer targets star he coached at Man Utd as first Besiktas signing
arts.sum: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has taken over at Besiktas, more than three years after his time as Manchester United manager came to an end, and he could have a busy January up ahead

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Andres Garcia to Aston Villa, Tom Lawrence to Besiktas, Jakub Moder to Brighton
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Andres Garcia to Aston Villa, Tom Lawrence to Rangers and Jakub Moder to Brighton & Hove Albion.

arts.ttl: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer returns to management with Besiktas in first role since leaving Manchester United
arts.sum: Solskjaer has been out of work since departing from Old Trafford in 2021 and is set to take on Jose Mourinho in Turkey

arts.ttl: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer targets player he coached at Man United as his first signing since returning to football with Besiktas
arts.sum: A move to Besiktas would see the midfielder reunite with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, who was appointed the side's new manager this week.

arts.ttl: Solskjaer confirmed as new Besiktas boss
arts.sum: Former Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer signs an 18-month deal as head coach of Besiktas.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano reveals 'initial interest' in Rangers midfielder
arts.sum: Rangers midfielder Tom Lawrence has transfer interest from Turkish side Besiktas.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Turkish Super Lig predictions including Besiktas vs. Samsunspor
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Turkish Super Lig fixtures, including Besiktas vs. Samsunspor.

arts.ttl: Solskjaer in talks to become Besiktas head coach
arts.sum: Besiktas are in talks with former Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer over their head coach vacancy.
